name: For-Ever Princess Baby Girl
description:
Hello Guys, Are you ready to take care of a princess baby girl? These royal kids need a lot of love and attention when they're going to grow up big and strong in her royal palace. In Forever princess baby girl care game we included lots of baby caring activities that you enjoy with baby girl like to give her clean bath, decorate the room theme, feed her nutritious and healthy foods, playing toys and Barbie dolls with her, help her in sleeping time and choose an amazing makeover with cute outfits, matched accessories and much more. These aren't ordinary babies, they're princess babies. So don't let these down royal babies. You can also enjoy challenging mini-games like a find the happy and funny face, cut fruits, memory game and much more. Enjoy playing this game and share your experience.

Features:-
Princess has every task theme like childhood game

Dress the babies in amazing costumes, clothes and charming outfits

Take care of a baby girl

Multiple levels of challenges with different tasks

Keep them happy and healthy face ever

Easy to play so it can be played by all ages
